divs: Sighting Details It was 4:00 am in the city of Cumana, Sucre State, Venezuela, 7 hours east of the capital city Caracas. Everyone was sleeping, unless a neighbor who was up all night. In the window he saw the object in the sky and called us at home, went to see her mom, my mom and me. I do not believe in such things until I peeked in the window and see something like a fly white, very white, without lights, their movements were like those of an insect flying around a light bulb. We were seeing the phenomenon almost an hour until everyone went to bed. My first reaction was a sort of experiment in the U.S. about Venezuela, I refused to believe it was a UFO. Please, I want an explanation, contact me, thank you. I do not know who to believe me, nobody believed me the other day, I was ashamed to continue counting, thinking he was crazy. I regret not having a video camera to record or take pictures. I swear to God, for my ancestry than I described here is the truth and nothing but the truth.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Cumana
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Strange thing in the sky of Cumana at 4:00 am
